baseline_texts: The image shows a green cylindrical container or cup placed on a fabric surface with a blue and white checkered pattern. The container is empty and positioned near the center of the frame. The fabric underneath appears slightly wrinkled.

This frame shows a close-up of a person's hand holding a green cylindrical container with a removable lid. The hand is lifting or placing the lid onto the container. The object is resting on a checkered fabric surface with blue and white colors.

The image shows a person's hand lifting the green lid off a matching green container. The container is placed on a surface covered with a blue and white checkered cloth. The person's hand is positioned near the top left of the image, gripping the lid to remove it.

This frame shows a close-up of a left hand holding a green circular object on a plaid patterned surface, which appears to be a fabric with a blue and white checkered design. The fingers are grasping the green object firmly.

The image shows a person's hand pressing down on a green puck-like object placed on a plaid-patterned fabric surface. The fabric has a checkered design with blue, white, and some beige colors. The hand is positioned with fingers spread slightly, grasping or pressing the round green object firmly.

The image shows a person's left hand resting on a green, round object. The hand is positioned with fingers spread on the object, which is lying on a surface covered with a checkered fabric featuring a pattern of blue, white, and beige squares. The object's exact purpose is unclear from this frame alone.

This frame shows a green circular object placed on a blue and white checkered fabric surface, likely a bedsheet or tablecloth. The object appears to be solid and smooth, and there's a slight shadow cast beneath it, indicating a light source from above. A small part of a hand is visible on the left side of the frame.

The frame shows a close-up view of a green hockey puck placed on a blue and white checkered fabric surface, likely a bedspread or blanket. The fabric pattern consists of alternating blue and white squares with thin intersecting lines. The puck is centered and casts a small shadow to its left side, indicating a light source coming from the right.
diff_texts: Initial frame. No previous frame to compare.
In the current frame, a hand appears, lifting the lid off the green container. The lid is tilted and partially removed compared to the previous frame where it was fully seated on the container.
The hand is lowering the green lid closer to the dark container below it.
The main object, a green cylindrical container, is being rotated or partially lifted by the hand, revealing the black interior of the container.
The hand has slightly shifted its grip on the green circular object, with the fingers adjusting their positions. The object itself has moved slightly to the right.
In the current frame, the hand has slightly shifted the green object to the right.
The hand has released the green circular object, which is now resting alone on the surface.
The green cylindrical object has moved slightly to the right in the current frame compared to the previous one.
